Header: Calls for protection of Wijayaba tusker
Content: The Organization for the Protection of Tamed Elephants says that immediate steps should be taken to protect the Wijayaba tusker that is roaming in the Minneriya Forest Reserve. Representatives of the Organization had visited the Habarana â€“ Digampathana area yesterday (01) to observe the 23-year-old tusker. They said that the tusker had already been injured few times after been shot by poachers and immediate steps should be taken to protect the animal.
